      public Book addBook(Book book)
      Save a new book to the database.
      Parameters:
      book - the book entity to be saved.
      Returns:
      the saved book entity.

    • getBook

      public Optional<Book> getBook(Long id)
      Retrieve a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an Optional which contains the book if found. Possible the book ID no longer exists.

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Retrieve all books from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all books.

    • removeBook

      public void removeBook(Long id)
      Remove a book from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book to be removed.

    • updateBookQuantity

      public Book updateBookQuantity(Long id, Integer quantity)
      Update the quantity of a specific book.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book.
      quantity - the new quantity to set.
      Returns:
      the updated book entity.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book with the given ID is not found.

    • getBookQuantity

      public Integer getBookQuantity(Long id)
      Obtain the quantity of a specific book.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book.
      Returns:
      the quantityInStock of book entity.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book with the given ID is not found.
